title: Patcher issue
body:
http://imgur.com/a/7p2TB

Every time I try to open my client, this happens.

Help.

replies.body: This looping issues should now be resolved!  If you're still having a problem, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look individually with you.
I'm having the same issue....stuck i an endless loop of the client trying to revert to an old version and restarting
